articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Ugandan President on Its 50th Independence Day
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Ugandan President on Its 50th Independence Day
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni on October 5 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message recalled that the Ugandan people have made great progress in the efforts to consolidate the political stability and peace of the country and ensure a sustainable development of the national economy under the unerring leadership of the president.
					
					 He expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, sincerely wishing the president success in his responsible work and Uganda steady development and prosperity.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Delegation of Parliamentary Group of Germany
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Delegation of Parliamentary Group of Germany
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK Choe Thae Bok met and had a talk with the delegation of the Germany-Korea Parliamentary Friendship Group led by Chairman Stefan Muller which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Nigerian Ambassador
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Nigerian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Nigerian Ambassador Nwofe Alexander who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets and Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Diplomatic Envoys
articles.content:
Floral Baskets and Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Diplomatic Envoys 
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with floral baskets and congratulatory messages by diplomatic envoys of different countries here on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A floral basket was handed to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, on Monday.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket by Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Le Quang Ba, with a floral basket and a congratulatory message by the Iranian charge d' affaires ad interim here and a congratulatory message by the Pakistani charge d' affaires ad interim here. 
					
					 The floral baskets and congratulatory messages were conveyed to officials concerned.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Monday sent a birthday spread to Jo Hui Jo living in Roun-ri, Chonnae County of Kangwon Province, congratulating the woman on her 100th birthday.
					 Jo, who lived as a member of a stateless nation during the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea, could lead a genuine life after President Kim Il Sung liberated the country.
					
					 She worked hard to contribute to increasing the grain production with a will to repay the benevolence of the party and the leader.
					
					 Even after retiring for her age, she continued to work.
					
					 Leading an optimistic life with a balanced diet, Jo requests her offspring to work harder for the benevolent country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Fighter
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Fighter
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Monday sent a birthday spread to anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter Jon Mun Jin on her 100th birthday.
					 Born in a foreign country in October 1912, Jon suffered sorrow over being a member of the stateless nation. 
					
					 It was not until she came into the care of President Kim Il Sung that she could lead a worthwhile life.
					
					 She devoted herself to accomplishing the historic cause of national liberation and had the honor of making a military uniform for the President while working as a member of the sewing team.
					
					 She dedicated herself to building a rich and powerful socialist country, working as an official of the women's union and in the field of the preservation of cultural relics.
					
					 She is honored with Orders of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the title of Labor Hero and other high state commendations.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il presented a birthday spread to her on her 90th birthday.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Un, who personified the noble personalities of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, she keeps herself in good health.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in various parts of the DPRK on Monday, the 15th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers Party of Korea.
					 The plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, April 25 House of Culture, Arch of Triumph and other venues were packed with youth and students who gathered with a great pride and honor of vigorously advancing toward a final victory under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, with leader Kim Jong Il held in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 Parties began with the song "Confetti of Best Wishes".
					
					 Joy and optimism could be read on the faces of the participants cheerfully dancing to the tune of songs including "It Is October" and "Party Gives Us Pleasure" as they are bringing youth into full bloom under the warm care of the mother party glorified by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The festive atmosphere picked up when the band played songs "Both Youth and Country Will Shine", "At One Go" and "Let's Go Straight." 
					
					 All the participants were replete with revolutionary enthusiasm to demonstrate their might as members of vanguard and shock brigades who perform feats in the on-going advance for a great upsurge for building a rich and powerful nation and improving the people's living standard by single-mindedly remaining true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Similar dancing parties were held in local cities and other parts of the country on the same day.

articles.title: Performance Given by Young Art Squad
articles.content:
Performance Given by Young Art Squad
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the plaza of the Party Founding Memorial Tower on Monday, the 15th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The performance began with narrations and mixed chorus "The Party Is Embrace of the General" and "Glory to Our Great Party".
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including male solo "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party" and female trio "You Are My Mother".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the immortal feats the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il performed by wisely leading the WPK with his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and energetic leadership and putting the dignity and national power of Kim Il Sung's nation on the highest level and ushering in a new era of the DPRK. 
					
					 Guitar quintet "Camp Fire, Flare up", mixed duo "I Will Devote My Youth to the Country" and other numbers powerfully demonstrated the revolutionary mettle of the members of the young vanguard performing feats in the all-out march in the new century of Juche with the will to flatten even a high mountain if asked by the party to do so.
					
					 The audience was mesmerized when they presented male duo "Our Leader Loved by the People" and male solo "Fly High, Our Party Flag" singing of all service personnel and people's high pride and honor of having the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the helm of the WPK and the revolution.
					
					 Among the audience were officials of the youth league and youth and students in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Performance Given by Successful Participants in Individual Art Contest
articles.content:
Performance Given by Successful Participants in Individual Art Contest 
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by successful participants in the 7th individual art contest among school youth and children at the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace on Monday, the 15th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 It began with female vocal solo "We Loudly Shout Long Live General Kim Jong Il." The performers sang high praises of the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed by developing the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party, a mother party taking care of the destiny of the people and the younger generation of the DPRK in a responsible manner.
					
					 In vocal duet "Thank you father General", vocal solo "Our grateful sun" and other numbers the performers represented strong yearning and profound thanks to Kim Jong Il who wished Songun Korea a rosy future with his broad smile and protected the happiness of all school youth and children in the country.
					
					 In vocal duet "Benevolent care of the Party", kayagum solo "I am flower bud", solo dance "Drum dance" and "Top dance" and other numbers they clearly reflected the bright and cheerful appearance of the happy children in the era of Songun who are bringing their hope and talents into full bloom under the care of the Party.
					
					 The audience was deeply impressed by vocal duet "Let's sing louder the song of General Kim Jong Il" and chorus "Advance by following footsteps of Kim Jong Un" reflecting the unshakable will of school youth and children to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal sun and make long journeys of Songun revolution to the last, true to the guidance of the Party.
					
					 Among the audience were Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, officials concerned, officials of the youth league and school youth and children here.

articles.title: Premiere of Acrobatic Drama "Tale of Chun Hyang"
articles.content:
Premiere of Acrobatic Drama "Tale of Chun Hyang" 
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Creators and acrobats of the National Circus of the DPRK produced acrobatic drama "Tale of Chun Hyang."
					 The folk tale well known in the past through a feature film and opera has been newly adapted for the acrobatic drama to contribute to the development of Juche-based literature and arts and education of people.
					
					 The drama is a good combination of all elements of circus including aerial, synchronized swimming, ground and ice stunts and magic. It makes a truthful artistic representation of the love between Chun Hyang and Mong Ryong, clearly revealing the reactionary nature of the feudal status system and successfully showcasing the beautiful ethics and morality of Koreans.
					
					 The performers successfully represented the ideological theme of the drama by use of modern stage decor and lighting, numbers such as swinging, seesawing, rope walking, balancing on the water, etc. with the use of unique methods of acrobatics including magic.
					
					 They raised the curtain at the Pyongyang Circus Theater on Monday.
					
					 It was enjoyed by officials in the fields of literature and arts and media, creators, artistes, media persons and people in Pyongyang.
					
					 The performance continues.

articles.title: Staff Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Visit Party Founding Museum
articles.content:
Staff Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Visit Party Founding Museum
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) visited the Party Founding Museum here on Monday on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They looked round with keen interest the historic materials and relics, being briefed on the fact that President Kim Il Sung accomplished the cause of party building just after Korea's liberation and developed the WPK into the headquarters of the revolution.
					
					 At the end of the visit the chief said:
					
					 We pay highest respects to Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who performed undying feats for the foundation and development of the WPK.
					
					 The WPK will always win victory as it is under wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, another great man of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The members of the AINDF will make more dynamic struggle to achieve national reunification with concerted efforts of the Korean people.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the China Institutes of Contemporary International Relations headed by President Cui Liru arrived here Monday.
					 Departing here on the same day were the delegation of the Germany-Korea Parliamentary Friendship Group led by Chairman Stefan Muller and the delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Singapore led by Permanent Secretary Bilahari Kausikan.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Party Founding Memorial Tower, People's Pleasure Park
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Party Founding Memorial Tower, People's Pleasure Park
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps in the DPRK visited the Party Founding Memorial Tower on Monday in the run-up to the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The guests looked round its tower body, round belt and platform, being briefed on the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il for building and developing a Juche-oriented revolutionary party and the invincible might of the WPK that has covered the road of victory and glory.
					
					 Doyen of the corps Wang Zhilin, economic and commercial councilor of the Chinese embassy, said the visit offered an opportunity to know well about the glorious history of the WPK.
					
					 He wished the Korean people greater successes in all fields under the guidance of the WPK.
					
					 The guests also visited the Rungna People's Pleasure Park.

articles.title: French Political Figure Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
French Political Figure Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Maurice Cukierman, international secretary of the C.C., the French Revolutionary Communist League, visited Mangyongdae.
					 He looked round the historic relics at the old home of President Kim Il Sung with deep attention, being briefed on his immortal revolutionary history and patriotic and revolutionary family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 At the end of his visit he said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was born in a revolutionary and patriotic family.
					
					 He devoted his all to the people's happiness.
					
					 He was the great man who glorified the 20th century.
					
					 The guest also toured the Tower of Juche Idea, the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the Mansudae Art Studio, the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory, etc.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The government delegation of the Federal Republic of Nigeria and the delegation of the China Institutes of Contemporary International Relations visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday to pay tribute to them.
					 They laid bouquets before the statues and paid respect for them.
					
					 Meanwhile, Yonas Tegegen Woldemariam, representative of the WHO here, and the staff members of his mission placed a floral basket before the statues of the great men of Mt. Paektu on the same day in the run-up to the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Nigerian Government Delegation Arrives
At Least 10,000 Exemplary Teachers Produced This Year
articles.content:
At Least 10,000 Exemplary Teachers Produced This Year
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The number of October 8 exemplary teachers is on the daily increase in the DPRK thanks to the drive to carry out the educational policy of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il put forth important tasks to be carried out to bring about a new turn in teaching and education while giving field guidance to Mubong Secondary School in Samjiyon County on Oct. 8, 2002. Many teachers and officials have been granted the honor of becoming "October 8 exemplary teachers" in the course of their drive to implement the tasks.
					
					 Such honor has been bestowed upon more than 10,000 teachers and officials in the field of education this year in recognition of their devotion made to train younger generation, bearing deep in mind the noble outlook of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un on them.
					
					 Teachers of universities and colleges across the country including Kim Il Sung University, Pyongyang Medical College of the University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Nampho University of Fisheries and Phyongsong College of Economy have put teaching on an intensive and popular basis and increased efficiency of education methods with modern visual aids.
					
					 Qualifications of teachers have improved in the field of common education and new teaching methods have been actively explored to apply the heuristic method of teaching. Modern teaching aids have been contrived to contribute to experiments and practice as required by the developing reality.
					
					 More than a half of the teachers of factory, fishery and farm colleges had the honor of becoming exemplary teachers to do their bit in displaying the advantages and vitality of the study-while-working educational system in the DPRK.
					
					 Those teachers and officials are taking the lead in building knowledge-based economic power in hearty response to the Ordinance on Enforcing the Universal 12-year Compulsory Education.

articles.title: Mammary Gland Tumor Institute Goes Operation at Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
articles.content:
Mammary Gland Tumor Institute Goes Operation at Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Mammary Gland Tumor Institute has been successfully built at the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital as required by the new century.
					 The institute is a modern medical service center for the prevention and treatment of mammary gland diseases and scientific researches.
					
					 A ceremony for its completion took place on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Yong Rim, Choe Thae Bok, Mun Kyong Dok, officials of ministries and national institutions, soldier-builders and officials and employees of the hospital.
					
					 Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health, said in his address the institute was built on the initiative of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and under the meticulous guidance of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called on the officials and employees of the hospital to put the treatment and prevention of mammary gland diseases and scientific research on a high level and take good care of medical equipment and apparatuses, bearing deep in mind the great care shown by Kim Jong Un who spares nothing for the health of the women in the DPRK.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony its participants went round different places of the institute.

articles.title: Multimedia Program "Encyclopedia of Acupuncture and Moxibustion" Developed
articles.content:
Multimedia Program "Encyclopedia of Acupuncture and Moxibustion" Developed
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Phyongsong University of Medicine in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has recently developed multimedia program "Encyclopedia of Acupuncture and Moxibustion", which is very popular among medical experts.
					 Compiled in the first e-encyclopedia in the country are the successes made in the field of acupuncture and moxibustion.
					
					 The program helps easily spot out 14 acupuncture regions in human body, used by ancestors in medical treatment. Regions are different from each other in depth and spot according layers of human body, including skin, vasomotor nerves and muscle.
					
					 It also contains explanations on chart of meridian nerve points, acupuncture points and distribution of nerves in human body.
					
					 In its guide on medical treatment by acupuncture and moxibustion, the program elaborates on concepts, causes, symptoms, diagnoses, prevention and treatment of diseases by acupuncture and moxibustion, cupping, hand, Koryo electron appliance and other means in contrast to modern medicine.
					
					 The program also contains books on acupuncture and moxibustion published up to now.

articles.title: New Tourist Itineraries Proposed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Tourist Itineraries Proposed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has offered new tourist itineraries, drawing attention of foreign people.
					 Last May an airplane of the Koryo Air Company with European flight hounds aboard left Pyongyang Airport for tour of Mt. Paektu. Those tourists also went sightseeing in the east coastal area in the country by another plane taking off at Samjiyon Airport. This was the first demonstration tourism by air for foreigners in the country.
					
					 Tourists can satisfy their curiosity through tour and photographing of airplanes of various types possessed by the company and use of them.
					
					 The company has various kinds of civilian airplanes. Those planes have been used for a long time, but their technical and external state is still kept fine.
					
					 Those tourists are satisfied with such air tourist service for diversity in air transport means and convenience in their use.
					
					 According to organizers of the tourism by air, flight tourist groups visited Pyongyang in May, July and September and another group of aviation enthusiasts is to arrive here in October.
					
					 Such tourism is expected to become more popular next year.
					
					 Meanwhile, bicycle tourism was launched last year, winning popularity among foreign tourists.
					
					 This year, tourists spent pleasant days in Pyongyang and Mts. Paektu and Kuwol, touring these areas extending tens of kilometers by bicycle.
					
					 It is also planned to organize mini-golf tourism next year.

articles.title: Lathe No. 26 Associated with Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
articles.content:
Lathe No. 26 Associated with Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly on Thursday issued a decree on awarding the title of Labor Hero to lathe No. 26 at the Pyongyang Textile Machine Factory.
					 Lathe No. 26 is a historic one with which the model machine movement was launched in the country. This machine had operated in full capacity over last more than 50 years and was developed into a CNC lathe, contributing to the production of many spare parts needed for textile and other important equipment of the country.
					
					 From April 21 to May 8 in 1961, General Secretary Kim Jong Il personally operated the lathe at the Pyongyang Textile Machine Factory for production practice during his days of study at Kim Il Sung University. In the period he set an example of managing the machine with deep care.
					
					 Later, he visited the factory and said that he would always remember the days of production practice with the lathe.
					
					 The Pyongyang Textile Machine Factory and other industrial establishments across the country have steadily conducted the movement to create model lathes following the example of Lathe No. 26. In the course many machines won the title of "Lathe No. 26" Model Machine and a large number of workteams and workshops twice or thrice "Lathe No. 26" Model Workteam or Model Workshop Title.
					
					 Lathe No. 26 implants all the workers and other people in the country with Kim Jong Il's patriotism and encourage them to performing great feats in socialist construction.

articles.title: Turf Planted and Cultivated as Mass Movement
articles.content:
Turf Planted and Cultivated as Mass Movement 
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A brisk drive is now under way in Pyongyang to turn it into a city clad in thick verdure and adorned with all species of flowers.
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un has paid deep attention to the work for face-lifting the land of the country as required by the era of Songun. He gave an instruction on planting turf while providing field guidance to Changjon Street in May and clearly indicated tasks and ways for doing this work well on a number of occasions.
					
					  Officials of ministries and national institutions have taken the lead in planting new species of turf seeds to more splendidly spruce up the area around the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					
					 The Horticultural Management Bureau of the Pyongyang City People's Committee minutely organized the work for planting and tending on a large scale land-greening plants including turf.
					
					 A base capable of producing one hectare of turf appeared at each nursery in districts and counties and waste lands turned into grounds for cultivating turf.
					
					 The entire length of Kwangbok Street was carpeted with nice turf.
					
					 The Central, Pothong, Sosong and Moranbong Districts of the city are also channeling efforts into planting land-greening plants like turf.
					
					 Mansudae, Chollima, Pulgun, Ponghwa, Hasin and Kaesonmun Streets have finished planting turf through a mass movement.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Settle Its Past Crimes without Fail
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Settle Its Past Crimes without Fail 
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Korean people will surely force Japan to pay a thousand-fold price for the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists and smash the Japanese militarists' moves to reinvade Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article.
					 On Oct. 8, 1895, a gang of Japanese man-killers headed by the then Japanese Diplomatic Minister in Korea Miura stormed its royal palace and murdered Queen Min and many court ladies and ministers in cold blood, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The murder of Queen Min was one of the most hideous crimes the Japanese imperialists committed against the Korean people.
					
					 This incident proved that the Japanese imperialists were the most ferocious barbarians in the world as they killed even the queen of a country to meet their aggressive purposes.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists' savage murder of the queen of Korea whom the nation considered as a symbol of the state sovereignty after storming the royal palace was absolutely unpardonable barbarism in the light of ethics, morality and international law.
					
					 The crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists during their colonial rule over Korea were unheard-of crimes against humanity and the Korean nation.
					
					 67 years have passed since the defeat of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are, however, craftily working to evade the responsibility for the bloody history of their invasion of Korea, far from making apology and reparation for them. 
					
					 They are sadly mistaken if they think they can repeat the history of their past aggression of Korea.
					
					 Minju Joson in a bylined article says that the slaying of the queen was monstrous state-sponsored terrorism perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists in the past.

articles.title: Indelible Crime of Japanese Imperialists Condemned
articles.content:
Indelible Crime of Japanese Imperialists Condemned
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- It has been 117 years since the Japanese imperialists stormed the royal palace of the feudal state of Ri Dynasty in Korea on October 8, 1895 and stabbed to death Min, wife of the 26th king Kojong.
					 At that time Queen Min was one of those who represented the state power of Korea and the royal palace was considered a sacred place symbolic of the state sovereignty.
					
					 The then Japanese rulers dispatched Lieut. General Miura as their minister resident in Korea to kill its queen who stood against Japan by becoming the chief of the pro-Russian faction.
					
					 On October 3, 1895 Miura called a meeting at the Japanese legation in Seoul and formed a group of murderers by enlisting the Japanese garrison and police forces and even gangsters.
					
					 At the dawn of October 8 the group stormed the Kyongbok Royal Palace, killing its guards, and encircled the Konchong Palace where King and Queen were staying. They intruded into the palace and savagely killed the queen and court ladies. And they burnt her dead body and threw her remains into a pond. 
					
					 The murder of the queen was a crime against humanity rare to be found in history, and it was a hideous crime against the Korean nation as it was worked out and executed under Japan's policy of aggression on Korea.
					
					 After their illegal occupation of Korea the Japanese imperialists enforced harsh colonial fascist rule, imposing untold misfortunes and sufferings upon the Korean people.
					
					 67 years have passed since the Japanese imperialists' defeat. However, Japan is still resorting to the cunning tricks to evade its responsibility for the past crimes, far from making an apology and reparation.
					
					 Such reckless moves of the Japanese reactionaries only make the Korean army and people harden their resolve and will to settle accounts with Japan to the last.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Advancing along Road of Juche
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Advancing along Road of Juche
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea on October 8, 1997 marked a historic event of great significance in carrying out the cause of building a Juche-oriented party and a thriving nation.
					 Now the army and people of the DPRK are full of firm will to uphold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK, recollecting with deep emotion his immortal revolutionary career, Rodong Sinmun editorially says on Monday.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was an outstanding leader and a peerless veteran statesman who developed the WPK into an organizer and guide of all the victories of the Korean people and led the Korean revolution along the road of victory, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the basic requirement for maintaining the revolutionary character of the WPK as the party of the leader to uphold Kim Jong Il as eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 This is a crucial work for thoroughly embodying his idea and line and achieving the final victory of a thriving nation.
					
					 His idea and line serve as eternal guidelines of the WPK and the Korean revolution.
					
					 We have to thoroughly implement his idea and line and glorify another 100 years of the Juche era as a century of victory and prosperity.
					
					 All the party members, servicepersons and other people should dynamically advance along the road of the Juche revolution under the leadership of the WPK, an invincible party shining with the august names of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 The editorial calls on all the people to rally close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un and advance toward the final victory, flying the flag of the WPK as the military colors of the revolution.

articles.title: Fascist Law Exam in S. Korean Police Creates Uproar
articles.content:
Fascist Law Exam in S. Korean Police Creates Uproar
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed recently that an exam was conducted by south Korean police with a view to intensifying the suppression of people on the strength of the fascist "Security Law," sparking uproar in south Korea.
					 According to the disclosure, the Seoul District Police Office conducted an exam among 176 policemen in charge of security three times in April, May and September under the pretext of beefing up the security investigation forces.
					
					 The exam was aimed at infusing the poisonous provisions of the "Security Law" including charges of espionage, provision of facility, special escape, general infiltration, praise and encouragement, etc. into policemen.
					
					 The Police Agency highly appreciated this and called on 15 other local police offices to apply the experience. 
					
					 A member of Solidarity for Progress, protesting against this, declared that it is an anachronistic move to intensify the invocation of the law by conducting even the exam at a time when the repeal of the SL should be debated with the "presidential election" at hand.
					
					 A lawmaker from the opposition Unified Progressive Party blasted  the police for working hard to gain results by investigating people on charges of violation  of SL for the mere reason that they raised issues concerning the south-north exchange or carried articles on the north under the Lee regime.
					
					 The lawmaker queried, "Is it not the intention to prevent the emergence of a future-oriented regime to intensify the investigation into those people charged with violation of SL at a time when the inter-Korean relations remain severed?" 
					
					 He urged the police to halt the exam farce at once.

articles.title: Seoul District Court Accused of Sentencing Inhabitant to Jail Term
articles.content:
Seoul District Court Accused of Sentencing Inhabitant to Jail Term
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Central District Court of south Korea sentenced an inhabitant to a prison term on charge of violation of the "Security Law" for the mere reason that he posted articles calling for national reunification on his Internet website.
					 This south Korean fisherman posted the articles on his Internet website after opening it with an ardent desire for reunification.
					
					 The fascist government authorities took such action against him, claiming he would post articles even praising the north on his website.
					
					 At the court, he held that his call for reunification can never be a crime, renewing his will to keep posting articles calling for reunification.
					
					 South Koreans of different social standings protested against this action, saying "We now know the reason why there were the results of a survey on Internet websites that the freedom to Internet has been seriously violated in south Korea". "How can a call for alleviating the pain resulting from the division and enabling the compatriots to live in peace as one be punishable?" They queried. 
					
					 The authorities' wholesale crackdown on Internet users is intended to create an environment favorable for the conservative quarters' stay in power through the forthcoming "presidential election" and gag on the progressive forces.

articles.title: Implementation of North-South Declarations Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of North-South Declarations Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Media Headquarters of the South Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, the People's Solidarity for June 15 and October 4 Declarations and the Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea held a seminar in Seoul on October 4, the 5th anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 The speakers at the seminar accused Lee Myung Bak of having shunned the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and pressurized the north by pursuing his unilateral "policy toward the north." 
					
					 They continued:
					
					 The Lee group concluded that the "Cheonan" warship sinking case, in particular, was "caused by the north" without any evidence and cried out for "punishment" and "retaliation," seriously bedeviling the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 It is the work for laying groundwork for achieving prosperity common to the nation to realize reconciliation, cooperation and exchange between the south and the north.
					
					 They urged the "government" to pave the way for enterprises through positive south-north economic cooperation.
					
					 The implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration is the historical responsibility to be fulfilled by all the members of the Korean nation irrespective of ruling or opposition forces and progressive or conservative forces, they declared.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration Observed in Japan
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Internet Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Internet Website
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" was posted on the Internet website by the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship on Oct. 2.
					 The work, published on April 6, 2012, clarifies that it is a principled requirement for the victorious advance of the Korean revolution to hold General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into a glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Anniversary Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- There took place an opening ceremony of Korean book, photo and art exhibition and film show in Mexico, a meeting in Italy and lectures in Guinea and France between Sept. 27 and Oct. 1.
					 Those events were held to mark the 15th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the 67th anniversary of the Party and the 86th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					
					 On display in the venues of the events were famous works of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, books and photos introducing the service persons and people performing miracles in building a thriving nation and fine arts pieces associated with the creative wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The participants in the film show watched films of the DPRK "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "The Grand Gymnastic and Artistic Performance 'Arirang'"
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, noted that the existence of such an invincible revolutionary party as the WPK provides great strength and courage to the world progressive people and revolutionaries.
					
					 A department director of a district committee of Rome Municipality of the Communist Party of Italy said that the WPK is fully demonstrating its dignity and might before the world along with the august names of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 The director of the Editorial Board of Teleambiente TV Consortium of Italy and the chief of the editorial board of a magazine-publishing house of Italy said that progressive mankind boundlessly reveres Kim Jong Il who wisely led the WPK, and highly praises the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Camano Vitor, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry, Guinea, noted that the single-minded unity of whole society in the DPRK is growing stronger as supreme leader Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, is pursuing politics of love for the people, successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Foreign Paper, Internet Homepages Mark Anniversary of October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Foreign Paper, Internet Homepages Mark Anniversary of October 4 Declaration 
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Indian and Swiss media ran articles on Oct. 1 on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of the historic October 4 Declaration.
					 The Indian paper Tourism Era said that the "declaration for development of north-south relations and peace and prosperity" was adopted at the north-south summit held in the capital city of Pyongyang of the DPRK in October 2007.
					
					 It noted that the October 4 declaration calls for independently settling the issue of national reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself" clarified in the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, attaching importance to the dignity and interests of the Korean nation and orientating everything toward it.
					
					 The October 4 declaration comprehensively deals with all issues arising for the development of the inter-Korean ties, achieving the peace of the Korean Peninsula and promoting the interests common to the nation, it said.
					
					 The contents clarified in the declaration constitute the realistic issues which are of key significance in warming the inter-Korean ties and achieving the independent reunification, peace and prosperity, it noted.
					
					 The declaration provides the important way for defusing the military tensions prevailing on the Korean Peninsula, positively propelling the development of the inter-Korean relations and achieving the common prosperity of the nation as it fully reflects the desire of the Korean nation to settle all issues in the direction of achieving reconciliation, cooperation and reunification, away from the concept dating back to the confrontation era, it noted.
					
					 The Internet homepages of the Switzerland－Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea noted that the publication of the declaration was the historic event of great significance in the reunification movement of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea persistently resort to the anti-DPRK war provocation and moves against reunification, but they will never be able to break the will of the Korean nation to reunify the country, the homepages said, and continued:
					
					 The people of the DPRK are sure to win a victory in the drive for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK and October 4 Declaration Hailed by Foreign Social Bodies
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK and October 4 Declaration Hailed by Foreign Social Bodies 
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Bodies of Democratic Congo and Nigeria issued statements on the occasions of the fifth anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration and the 32nd anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK).
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo noted in its statement on October 1 that President Kim Il Sung laid down a proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo in the interests of all Koreans in order to peacefully achieve the reunification of the country, and General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided the October 4 declaration, an action programme for carrying out the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The proposals for national reunification advanced by them have been fully supported by the Korean and world progressive peoples, and their validity and vitality clearly proved in practice, the statement noted.
					
					 It extended firm support and solidarity to the just cause of the people of the DPRK to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country by federal formula under the banner of the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics said in a statement on October 2 that the declaration clearly clarifies the practical ways for national reunification.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak in south Korea, however, totally denied the historic north-south joint declarations from the outset of his office, and went reckless as to pursue the confrontation policy to push the inter-Korean ties to the worst phase and the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the touch-and-go one. 
					
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un declared "Counter a provocation with a prompt counterattack and a war of aggression with a great, just war for national reunification!" in a speech at the banquet in celebration of August 25, the anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership, adding that this is the principled stand and steadfast will of the Korean people.
					
					 The Nigerian group will invariably support the people of the DPRK all out in the struggle for the just cause.

articles.title: October 4 Declaration Hailed by Foreign Social Bodies
articles.content:
October 4 Declaration Hailed by Foreign Social Bodies
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Swiss and Ecuadorian bodies released statements on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The Switzerland－Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement said that the October 4 declaration was adopted thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il's patriotic will and bold decision, adding that he ushered in the June 15 era of reunification based on the idea of "By our nation itself!", an embodiment of the Three Charters for National Reunification initiated by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The pro-U.S. Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea totally denied the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration and completely disrupted the process for reducing the tensions between the north and the south of Korea and promoting the cooperation between them. Instead, it hatched such plots as a "Cheonan" warship sinking case under the patronage of the U.S. imperialists to drive the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 No matter how recklessly the Lee regime may try, it can never stem the trend of the history towards the reunification of Korea.
					
					 The Ecuador－Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People in a statement on Oct. 3 said that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration serve as the great programme for national reunification, indicative of the noble patriotic intention and devotion of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It said that the October 4 declaration is being fully supported by not only all the Korean people but the international community as it is an action programme for the June 15 joint declaration that reaffirms the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and clarifies concrete ways of achieving the lasting peace on the Korean Peninsula and developing the exchange and cooperation between the north and the south in all fields.

articles.title: Political Party Leader of Democratic Congo Supports WPK and Korean People
articles.content:
Political Party Leader of Democratic Congo Supports WPK and Korean People
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Evariste Boshab, secretary general of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of Democratic Congo, met with Ri Myong Chol, DPRK ambassador to Democratic Congo on Oct. 2.
					 The secretary general said that it is the fruition of the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, that the people of the DPRK are advancing along the road chosen by themselves with confidence not experiencing any turns and twists after the untimely demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He noted that his party extends support and solidarity to the struggle of the WPK and people of the DPRK to frustrate the moves of the imperialist forces and defend their just cause, extending warm congratulations to the WPK on its 67th anniversary.
					
					 He expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and the two peoples would grow stronger.

articles.title: Nepalese Media Introduce DPRK
articles.content:
Nepalese Media Introduce DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Sakirmata TV Broadcasting Service aired for three days from Sept. 29 the special program on the visit to the DPRK by the International Committee for the Study of Songun Politics for Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Nepal.
					 The reconstruction layout for Pyongyang, capital of the DPRK, which was once reduced to ashes after the war the U.S. imperialists provoked against the DPRK in 1950, was mapped out in the wartime under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the program said and went on:
					
					 The monuments in Pyongyang demonstrate the tremendous might of the Korean people.
					
					 The Tower of the Juche Idea that symbolizes the Juche idea was unveiled in 1982 on the 70th birthday of the President.
					
					 Carved in relief on the body of the tower are letters "Juche".
					
					 The 20 meter high torch represents the architecture of the DPRK developing day by day on the basis of Juche character and national identity.
					
					 Kim Il Sung Square located in the center of the capital is well known to the world as a venue of military parades, mass meetings and lots of other national events.
					
					 The Kumsusan Palace of the Sun is where the President, father of socialist Korea, and General Secretary Kim Jong Il lie in state. 
					
					 Korean people visit this palace to pay tribute to them.
					
					 The program introduced in detail the President's old home at Mangyongdae, Arch of Triumph, Party Founding Memorial Tower, Three Charters for National Reunification Memorial Tower, Panmunjom, etc.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un asiste al acto central por el 8 de octubre
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un asiste al acto central por el 8 de octubre
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 15o aniversario de la eleccion (8 de octubre) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Estuvo presente en la ocasion el Mariscal        Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Asistieron al conclave Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, las entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las ramas de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion, los benemeritos y trabajadores.
					
					Todos los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam.
					
					La eleccion del Dirigente como Secretario General del PTC fue un evento politico digno de registrarse en letras mayusculas en el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo del PTC y el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, dijo el informante y continuo:
					
					Durante medio siglo, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il realizo imborrables hazanas ante el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo con su destacada idea y orientacion e incomparable coraje y gran abnegacion patriotica poniendose al frente del PTC.
					
					El fue genial ideologo y teorico quien ilumino el camino a seguir por el PTC y la revolucion coreana.
					
					Al formular la idea revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung como Kimilsungismo y promulgar el programa de transformar toda la sociedad segun esa doctrina, cumplio satisfactoriamente la historica causa de definir claramente la idea directriz y el maximo programa del PTC.
					
					Ademas, presento las teorias y los metodos de direccion sobre todas las esferas tales como la construccion del partido, el Estado, las fuerzas armadas, la economia y la cultura, preparando asi la guia enciclopedica con la que el PTC puede orientar la revolucion y la construccion por la senda mas correcta.
					
					Tras profundizar y desarrollar la idea Juche, la del Songun, aumento extraordinariamente el atractivo y la vitalidad de Kimilsungismo y enriquecio el tesorero de ideologias de la humanidad.
					
					Kim Jong Il es destacado politico y gran maestro de direccion quien fortalecio y desarrollo el PTC como invencible agrupacion politica y abrio nueva historia de construccion de una potencia socialista.
					
					Al considerar como tarea de toda su vida fortalecer el PTC como partido del Presidente, hizo desarrollar la construccion y las actividades del partido segun el Kimilsungismo observando bien los autoctonos principios de construccion del partido.
					
					Formulo la politica del Songun como modo de direccion del partido y consolido el PTC como estado mayor de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					Convirtio el PTC en una agrupacion politica revolucionaria que establecio firmemente el sistema de idea y direccion del lider, en la organizacion madre que se une de cuerpo y alma con el pueblo y sirve para este y en el partido invencible con ferrea disciplina y combatividad, lo cual constituye una proeza extraordinaria registrable en la historia del PTC.
					
					Conduciendo el PTC, puso de manifiesto la dignidad y el poderio de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y preparo la piedra angular de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Al orientar las labores partidistas al cumplimento de la linea revolucionaria del Songun, centuplico la capacidad defensiva del pais.
					
					Elevo el papel directivo del partido abriendo asi la era dorada de construccion de una patria prospera.
					
					En acato al legado del Presidente, formulo las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria y preparo la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre dejando abierta la fase trascendental del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria que avanza bajo el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					Siempre mantuvo la postura de independencia y los principios revolucionarios y condujo la corriente de la politica mundial. Asi elevo el prestigio exterior del PTC y el Estado e hizo gran contribucion al cumplimiento de la causa de independencia antiimperialista y la socialista.
					
					La autoctona idea y la causa de construccion del partido del Dirigente continuan y se desarrollan por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Al escribir nueva pagina de la realizacion de la causa de eternidad del lider, el Mariscal hizo brillar eternamente la vida y hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente y fortalecer y desarrollar el PTC como glorioso partido de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il teniendo al ultimo como eterno Secretario General.
					
					Gracias a la direccion de el, estan elevandose mucho el prestigio y el poderio del PTC y se hacen mas solidos el apoyo y la confianza del pueblo en el PTC.
					
					Todos los funcionarios, los militantes del partido y los trabajadores deben establecer el sistema de direccion unica del Mariscal en todo el partido y toda la sociedad y unirse compactamente en torno a el.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Uganda
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 5 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, con motivo del 50o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais.
					El remitente resalta que gracias a la guia correcta del destinatario, el pueblo de Uganda logro gran avance en la lucha por consolidar la estabilidad politica y la paz del pais y alcanzar el desarrollo sostenible de la economia nacional.
					
					Manifiesta la conviccion de que se consolidaran y se desarrollaran mas en el futuro las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre ambos paises y desea al destinatario exitos en sus responsabilidades y el desarrollo continuo y prosperidad de Uganda.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok se reune con delegacion alemana
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok se reune con delegacion alemana
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- Choe Thae Bok, presidente de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio este lunes en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion del grupo de parlamentarios de amistad Corea-Alemania encabezada por el presidente Stefan Muller, que le realizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop se reune con nuevo embajador nigeriano
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop se reune con nuevo embajador nigeriano
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio el dia 8 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con Nwofe Alexander, nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Federal de Nigeria, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.
